select count(1) from (select XT_JJRY.id,zjlx,sflx,xb,zjhm,dh,lb,fzcc,ly,zt,a.sflxName,case when xb=1 then '男' when xb=2 then '女' end as xbName,case when ly=1 then '平台' when ly=2 then 'App' end as lyName,case when zt=0 then '未通过' when zt=1 then '通过' when zt=2 then '黑名单' end as ztName from XT_JJRY left join (select dmmc as sflxName ,id from XT_GYDM ) a on XT_JJRY.sflx=a.id)t1 left join (select dmmc as zjlxName ,id from XT_GYDM) b on t1.zjlx=b.id
and xm like '%${xm}%'
